H0.text: what type of money to take to cuba. US Dollar

H1.text: what type of money to take to cuba. Euro

H2.text: what type of money to take to cuba. Canadian Dollar

H3.text: what type of money to take to cuba. Cuban peso

A4.text: The Cuban peso became the only legal tender in Cuba after the retirement of the CUC in 2021.

A5.text: As of August 19, 2025, the black market exchange rate in Cuba is 404 Cuban pesos per US dollar.
